attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ace scorer Wendy Wimbush has been a fixture in cricketing press boxes for over 30 years, but has been effectively axed from her position after Test Match sponsors NPower decided they no longer required her to prepare their statistics. This sort of shabby treatment is, I'm afraid, just not cricket.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
